item.title: The Story between R and Python
item.description: Blog Post 1 Link to project 1 Link to google Hello! In this blog, I will demonstrate how you can use reticulate to get R and Python to talk to each other! I'm also making a histogram of quakes just to show you that R is indeed working well by itself. Let's get started! hist(quakes$depth) library(reticulate) yes <- "Drugs are bad" After making some R stuff, I will now use Python to connect the two.
